mapper.insert: insert into friends_request_info (id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, send_user_id, accept_user_id, request_date_time, is_deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acceptUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update friends_request_info set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, send_user_id = #{sendUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accept_user_id = #{acceptUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_date_time = #{requestDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, send_user_id, accept_user_id, request_date_time, is_deleted from friends_request_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, send_user_id, accept_user_id, request_date_time, is_deleted from friends_request_info
